Hardeep Sandhu sentenced for aiding South Auckland attack on radio host Harnek Singh https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/crime/hardeep-sandhu-sented-for-aiding-south-south-auckland-drive-drive-trive-athack-onact-on-radio-hast-hast-hast-harst-harnek-singh/gjopslgq5jhlda7chcmmyxmceeei/- https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/crime/hardeep-sandhu-sented-for-aiding-south-south-auckland-drive-drive-trive-athack-onact-on-radio-hast-hast-hast-harst-harnek-singh/gjopslgq5jhlda7chcmmyxmceeei/- Craig KapitanAfter admitting attempted murder he recanted, claiming he was there for a debate only. Sun, 23 Mar 2025 06:00:00 +0000 Auckland radio host and YouTube personality Harnek Singh was stabbed over 40 times in his driveway. Sikh religious leader Gurinderpal Brar, a harsh critic of Singh's views, was found guilty of co-ordinating the failed assassination plot. Photos / Supplied
Tenancy tribunal rehearing for UK family’s ‘unliveable’ Auckland rental denied https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/nz/tenancy-tribunal-recheraith-for-uk-familys-unlivable-unlivable-auckland-rental-denied/lxgs7zbns5gprdozgn55555dprov4/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/nz/tenancy-tribunal-recheraith-for-uk-familys-unlivable-unlivable-auckland-rental-denied/lxgs7zbns5gprdozgn55555dprov4/ Hannah BartlettOwner believes the outcome might have been different if he’d defended the hearing himself. Sun, 23 Mar 2025 04:00:00 +0000 The landlord of the property rented to the Usher family won't be given an opportunity to "relitigate" the proceedings that saw $18,000 awarded to the tenants.

Revealed: Auckland construction figure charged with importing 515kg of meth in Operation Girder https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/revealed-auckland-construction-figure-farged-charged-with-importing-515kg-of-meth-meth-meth-in-in-operation-girder/6jzndiaufre45iu45iuwg46elelmcq/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/revealed-auckland-construction-figure-farged-charged-with-importing-515kg-of-meth-meth-meth-in-in-operation-girder/6jzndiaufre45iu45iuwg46elelmcq/ Jared SavageThe 52-year-old denies any knowledge of the drugs hidden inside 42 steel beams from the US Sat, 22 Mar 2025 16:00:00 +0000 Name suppression has lapsed for John Anthony Giles, 52, who has pleaded not guilty to importing 515kg of methamphetamine hidden inside steel beams exported from the United States in September 2024.
